study_plan_entry.title: Selected topics in mechanics of solids and structures

en.title: Selected topics in mechanics of solids and structures

free_text.Remarque: Liaison avec d'autres cours : Dynamique des structures, Génie Parasismique, Structures
free_text.Prérequis: Statique (pour GC), Mécanique des milieux continus (pour GC), Mécanique des structures I
free_text.Forme d'enseignement: Ex cathedra, exercices détaillés, études de cas
free_text.Contenu: [li]  Structural Dynamics/Wave Dynamics.[br/][br/][li]  Introduction to Fracture Mechanics.[br/][br/][li]  Plasticity.
free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: To reinforce the general culture in mechanics of solids and structures of the future engineer by highlighting fundamentals.[br/][br/]To study some advanced topics in recent or fondamental fields of structural and continuum mechanics.[br/][br/]To understand and model the behaviour of materials under extreme loading conditions.

fr.title: Selected topics in mechanics of solids and structures
